text:
e="preserve">Raheela Anwar () is a Pakistani politician who has been a Member of the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab, since May 2013.
Early life and education.
She was born on 20 February 1956 in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jhelum Jhelum].
Political career.
She was elected to the [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Provincial_Assembly_of_the_Punjab Provincial Assembly of the Punjab] as a candidate of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Tehreek-e-Insaf Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf] on a reserved seat for women in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2013 Pakistani general election, 2013].
